channel.title: Basic on MeVisLab Examples
channel.description: Recent content in Basic on MeVisLab Examples

item.title: Tips and Tricks
item.description: MeVisLab Tips and Tricks This chapter shows some features and functionalities which are helpful but do not provide its own tutorial. Keyboard Shortcuts Using Snippets Scripting Assistant User Scripts Show status of module in- and output Keyboard Shortcuts This is a collection of useful keyboard shortcuts in MeVisLab, hopefully it grows continuously. Shortcut Functionality Ctrl+1 Automatically arrange selection of modules / in the current network Ctrl+2 Open most recent network file Ctrl+3 Run most recent test case (extremely useful for developers) Ctrl+A then Ctrl+1 Layout network Ctrl+A then Tab Layout .
